SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Class ObservableView<Message>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ObservableView<Message>
Type Parameters:
Message - the type of the message sent to the observers
Direct Known Subclasses:
AskNumPlayersSceneController, EndGameSceneController, View, WaitingSceneController
public class ObservableView<Message> extends Object
The ObservableView class represents an observable view in the observer pattern
